# Contagion, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius spread

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 51

*Forcing a hacking cough, you complete the spell. In the area youâ€™ve designated, you see swirling red and black mist rise up, accompanied by the distant sound of your echoing cough.*

This spell functions like *[[Contagion (Spell)|contagion]]*, but all creatures within the area are infected.
